RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Advogado com 28 anos de experincia em Comrcio Internacional e Aduana, tenho um histrico comprovado em negcios nos setores de indstria, infraestrutura, energia, sade, digitalizao, tecnologia e varejo. Doutor e Mestre em Direito das Relaes Econmicas Internacionais pela PUC/SP, e especialista em Direito Internacional pela mesma instituio. Possuo tambm especializao em Gesto de Negcios Internacionais pelo SENAC/SP, e formao em Direito pela FMU, com um mdulo internacional pela University of Ldz. Sou Bacharel em Relaes Internacionais pela UNILUS.Minha carreira acadmica inclui atuao como professor em cursos de ps-graduao e LL.M. em instituies como Insper, PUC-SP, IBMEC e UNICSUL, abrangendo reas como Tributao Aduaneira, Comrcio Exterior, Direito Corporativo, Startups, Direito Digital, Direito Internacional Privado, Governana Corporativa e Cultura Organizacional. Fui tambm professor na FMU, lecionando Direito Internacional, Empresarial, Tributrio e Aduaneiro.Atuo como Lder da Comisso de Polticas de Comrcio e Investimentos da ICC Brasil e sou membro efetivo das Comisses de Direito Aduaneiro e de Direito Martimo e Porturio da OAB.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Attorney with 28 years of experience in International Trade and Customs, I have a proven track record in business sectors including industry, infrastructure, energy, health, digitization, technology, and retail. I hold a Doctorate and Master's in International Economic Relations Law from PUC/SP, and am specialized in International Law from the same institution. Additionally, I have a specialization in International Business Management from SENAC/SP, a Law degree from FMU with an international module at the University of Ldz, and a Bachelor's degree in International Relations from UNILUS.My academic career encompasses teaching postgraduate and LL.M. courses at renowned institutions such as Insper, PUC-SP, IBMEC, and UNICSUL in areas including Customs Taxation, Foreign Trade, Corporate Law, Startups, Digital Law, Private International Law, Corporate Governance, and Organizational Culture. I have also taught at FMU, covering International Law, Business Law, Tax, and Customs Law.I serve as the Leader of the Trade and Investment Policy Commission at ICC Brazil and am an active member of the Customs Law and Maritime and Port Law Commissions at OAB.
